trans-unit.source: The GUID ($FOLDERID_*) that identifies the known folder.

seg-source.mrk: The GUID ($FOLDERID_*) that identifies the known folder.

target.mrk: The GUID ($FOLDERID_*) that identifies the known folder.

trans-unit.source: The folder's new path.

target.mrk: The folder's new path.

trans-unit.source: [optional] This parameter can be 0 or the following value.

This parameter can be 0 or the following value.

trans-unit.source: [optional] The access token that represents a particular user. If this parameter is 0, the function requests

The access token that represents a particular user.
If this parameter is 0, the function requests

target.mrk: [optional]
The access token that represents a particular user.
If this parameter is 0, the function requests

trans-unit.source: the known folder for the current user. Assigning the $hToken parameter a value of (-1) indicates the

trans-unit.source: To call this function on public known folders, the caller must have Administrator privileges. For per-user known

seg-source.mrk: To call this function on public known folders, the caller must have Administrator privileges.
For per-user known

target.mrk: To call this function on public known folders, the caller must have Administrator privileges.
For per-user known

trans-unit.source: folders the caller only requires User privileges.

trans-unit.source: To call this function on a folder of type $KF_CATEGORY_COMMON, the calling application must be running with

trans-unit.source: This function cannot be called on folders of type $KF_CATEGORY_FIXED and $KF_CATEGORY_VIRTUAL.
